scripts.latest:dev: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=development && knex migrate:latest --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env development
scripts.latest:prod: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=production && knex migrate:latest --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env production
scripts.rollback:dev: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=development && knex migrate:rollback --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env development
scripts.rollback:prod: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=production && knex migrate:rollback --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env production
scripts.status:dev: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=development && knex migrate:status --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env development
scripts.status:prod: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=production && knex migrate:status --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env production
scripts.seed:dev: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=development && knex seed:run --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env development
scripts.seed:prod: tsc && SET NODE_ENV=production && knex seed:run --knexfile=./dist/db/knexfile --env production
